experienceDescription: I have 2 years of experience in credit control at ABC Company where I managed accounts receivable, followed up on overdue payments, and maintained positive relationships with clients. Successfully reduced DSO by 15%.
collectionStrategies: I use a multi-tiered approach: friendly reminders via email for recent overdues, phone calls for accounts 30+ days overdue, and escalation procedures for accounts 60+ days. I maintain detailed records and always approach clients professionally.
